    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractGameServer

        public AbstractGameServer(java.lang.String _gameCode,
                          java.lang.String _key,
                          GameOptions _gameOptions,
                          int _tickrateMillis,
                          int sendUpdateIntervalMillis,
                          int _clientRenderDelayMillis,
                          int _timeoutMillis)
        Parameters:
        _gameCode - Must match the client's game code.
        _key - Must match the server's game code.
        _gameOptions -
        _tickrateMillis - The interval between each iteration of the game loop.
        sendUpdateIntervalMillis - How often to send updates to the clients
        _clientRenderDelayMillis - How far in the past the client should render the game
        _timeoutMillis - How long without comms before the server disconnects the client
